byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and NICK CORASANITI

headline.print_headline: Trump and Cruz Unleash Combative Ads
headline.main: Donald Trump’s War With Ted Cruz Turns to the Airwaves

snippet: The increasingly fragile détente between Donald J. Trump and Senator Ted Cruz of Texas crumbled on Friday in a burst of negative advertisements and counter-attacks. The sparring came as Mr. Trump moved aggressively to derail Mr. Cruz’s chances of winning the Iowa caucuses in 10 days.
abstract: The increasingly fragile détente between Donald J. Trump and Senator Ted Cruz of Texas crumbled on Friday in a burst of negative advertisements and counter-attacks. The sparring came as Mr. Trump moved aggressively to derail Mr. Cruz’s chances of winning the Iowa caucuses in 10 days.
